EmailTemplate.name: 2019.12.18 - Whitespace - PricePlan - C - Thank-You-1 Email.PricePlan-Thankyou-E
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Pricing Plan Has Been Updated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
Your account has been updated and you are now a part of Pricing Plan 1. By making this change you now have access to: - Better than market Paper Pricing - $37.10 on 99115 Paper - Up to 15% OFF National Brand Paper, Office Supplies, Furniture, Cleaning & Breakroom Supplies - Up to 30% OFF over 900 Grand & Toy Private Label products - Premier Pricing for Ink and Toner - Special Discounts on the latest Technology
To celebrate you making the switch to this better pricing plan, please use this promo code SAVE1912 at checkout to take 10% off your first purchase. You can use this promo code on almost anything but bottled water, services and printing.
Please note this code expires December 20, 2019. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns, I am happy to assist.
Sincerely, Sean Beauchemin Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON K1G 0Z7 E-mail: seanbeauchemin@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:seanbeauchemin@grandandtoy.com]]> | Tel: 1-800-348-2184 Ext: 44170 Fax: 1-613-244-0765 Toll Free/Sans Frais Fax: 1-866-391-8555 Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom | Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
